title: Youtube videos freezing
content: Hello, For the last few months I am unable to watch most youtube videos on my Windows 10 laptop. There are no issues loading the video, but shortly afterwards the image freezes while the sound continues. Google chrome works fine, and Firefox is able to play the same videos correctly on my Windows 8 PC. It also seems to only affect newer videos. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: talkltalk

title: Prevent manage history - library from resetting
content: Is there an option to prevent the library from auto resetting to the top everytime I click an old website visit history? Its kind of annoying to always scroll down just to go back and click the next website to it. Im opening multiple histories btw I love ff.
